data.price: Kuma ka ce: "Yã Ubangijĩna*! Ka shigar, da ni shigar gaskiya, kuma Ka fitar da ni fitar gaskiya. Kuma Ka sanya mini, daga gun Ka, wani ƙarfi mai taimako."
data.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَدۡخِلۡنِي مُدۡخَلَ صِدۡقٖ وَأَخۡرِجۡنِي مُخۡرَجَ صِدۡقٖ وَٱجۡعَل لِّي مِن لَّدُنكَ سُلۡطَٰنٗا نَّصِيرٗا
data.footnotes: * Kuma ka yi addu'a a cikin sallarka da bãyanta da wannan addu'a dõmin ta nũna sallamãwarka ga Ubangijinka Allah.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi adkhil'nī mud'khala ṣid'qin wa-akhrij'nī mukh'raja ṣid'qin wa-ij'ʿal lī min ladunka sul'ṭānan naṣīran

dua.name: Dua for Emotional Intelligence
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine guidance in developing emotional understanding, compassion, and interpersonal skills.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
